name: Dragons vs Aliens LITE
description:
it is better to Download from Google play store, to get any automatic updates...but here is the most recent version...as of 4/19

Dragons vs Aliens Lite Dragons vs Aliens is a classic throw back to the side scroller, with endless action a difficult game that will drive you crazy,The GAME that is NOT the ads....because Dragons vs Aliens is an Ad free game..... Aliens have invaded earth and decimated the humans, in so doing they have disturbed a long sleeping creature of old, The Dragon...flying, fire breathing and full of Rage.....start out as a baby dragon with limited power, Upgrade to being an Adult and blast those alien scum off the face of the earth..
Collect power up to upgrade your dragon to lethal force...

with one baby Dragon and One adult dragon to play have hours of action, with no charge and No ads....
collect Aliens Skulls to Purchase the Baby Skins.

1 level comes with the game.

when the Dragon goes into a rage points are doubled...if you fly long enough you may even see the Alien Mother ship appear...
lots of explosions and all around fun, I hope you enjoy my game!

if you do enjoy  my game please rate it, on the google play store...

if You want more variety in Adult Dragons...you can Buy the Full version of Dragons vs Aliens on Google play store :-)
